statements: SELECT * FROM LearningPreferences;
SELECT student_id, learning_style FROM LearningPreferences;
SELECT preferred_language, preferred_subjects FROM LearningPreferences;
SELECT * FROM LearningPreferences WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, preferred_language FROM LearningPreferences WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';
SELECT * FROM LearningPreferences WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT learning_style, preferred_subjects FROM LearningPreferences WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';
SELECT student_id, preferred_language FROM LearningPreferences WHERE preferred_language = 'English' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LearningPreferences WHERE preferred_language <> 'Spanish' AND learning_style = 'Auditory';
SELECT student_id, learning_style, preferred_subjects, preferred_language FROM LearningPreferences WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY learning_style, student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT student_id, learning_style FROM preferences WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY content_name ASC;
SELECT content_name, tags FROM content WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY content_name DESC;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content WHERE tags LIKE '%math%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT learning_style, interests FROM preferences WHERE learning_style = 'Visual';
SELECT content_name, difficulty_level FROM content WHERE student_id = 5 ORDER BY content_name ASC;
SELECT content_name, tags FROM content WHERE content_type = 'Video' AND difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM content WHERE student_id = 3 AND tags LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, learning_preferences FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students, Courses, StudentCourseMapping WHERE Students.student_id = StudentCourseMapping.student_id AND Courses.course_id = StudentCourseMapping.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id FROM Students JOIN StudentCourseMapping ON Students.student_id = StudentCourseMapping.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, learning_preferences FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentCourseMapping ON Students.student_id = StudentCourseMapping.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON StudentCourseMapping.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS course_count FROM StudentCourseMapping GROUP BY student_id HAVING course_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, learning_preferences FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM enrollment;
SELECT student_name, learning_preference FROM students JOIN preferences_mapping ON students.student_id = preferences_mapping.student_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses JOIN enrollment ON courses.course_id = enrollment.course_id;
SELECT student_name, learning_preference FROM students JOIN preferences_mapping ON students.student_id = preferences_mapping.student_id WHERE learning_preference = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, learning_preferences FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM Enrollments INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, preference_name FROM StudentPreferences INNER JOIN Preferences ON StudentPreferences.preference_id = Preferences.preference_id ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, learning_preferences FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%advanced%' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_description FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 1;

SELECT student_name, preference_name FROM Students JOIN StudentPreferences ON Students.student_id = StudentPreferences.student_id JOIN Preferences ON StudentPreferences.preference_id = Preferences.preference_id ORDER BY preference_name ASC, student_name DESC;
